create or replace PROCEDURE         "BRF45_MAPPING_PROCEDURE" (REPORT_DATE VARCHAR2)
IS
   V_REPORT_DATE DATE := To_date (REPORT_DATE, 'DD-MM-YYYY'); 

BEGIN
--delete from BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE where REPORT_DATE = v_REPORT_DATE;
--Commit;

--Insert Query
--Government & Public Sector(BRF1)
--LOANS & ADVANCES (GROSS)-8.1	Government & Public Sector-8.1.1	FederalGovt 

INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

--8.1.2	Non Commercial entities (Federal Govt)-NIL

--8.1.3	Emirates Governments

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 legal_entity_type IN ('GOVTE') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

--8.1.4	Non-commercial entities (Emirates Govt)

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 legal_entity_type IN ('PSENO','PSEN') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') ;

--GREs (BRF1)
--8.1.5	GREs (Govt ownership more than 50%) 

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND 
legal_entity_type IN ('PSEC','PSECO') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

--Private Sector (Corporate)(BRF1)
-- 8.2.1Corporates with Govt ownership of less than 50%-NIL

--8.2.2	Other corporates

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND TURNOVER>250000000 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') ;

--8.2.4	Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs)

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181','31106') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND 
NVL(TURNOVER,0)<=250000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') ;

--HNI(BRF1)
--8.2.3	High Networth Individuals (HNI)

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND HNI_NETWORTH>20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

--Individuals(BRF1)
--8.3	Individuals 

 INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
 where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

 --For one Individuals account 

  INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
NVL(legal_entity_type,0)  in('','0')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND
 act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008'); 

 --Non Banking Financial Institutions(BRF1)
--4.1	NBFI-Loans and advances

  INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 ;

--Trade Bills(BRF1)
--TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED
--7.1	TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED- Gov & Public Sector
--7.1.1	Inland trade bills/ PDCs
--7.1.2	Foreign trade bills (Import and export)

--7.2	TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED- Private-7.2.1	Inland trade bills/ PDCs

  INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and purpose_of_advn not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code  in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');

  INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND ACCT_NUMBER in ('90010800000206') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0;

--7.2.2	Foreign trade bills (Import and export)

  INSERT INTO BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND gl_sub_head_code IN ('24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008');


--RESIDENT
UPDATE BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE SET nre_status='N' WHERE country_of_incorp IN ('AE','AE*','UAE');
COMMIT;

--NON-RESIDENT
UPDATE BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE SET nre_status='Y' WHERE country_of_incorp NOT IN ('AE','AE*','UAE');
COMMIT;

--UPDATE QUERY
--ROW 103
--Government & Public Sector
update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW103' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW103A'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')
AND country_of_incorp IN 'CA';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW103' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW103A'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',

WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND country_of_incorp IN 'DE';
COMMIT;

WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND country_of_incorp IN 'NO';
COMMIT;

COMMIT;

WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND country_of_incorp IN 'TR';
COMMIT;

COMMIT;

legal_entity_type in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')
AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187A'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
legal_entity_type IN ('GOVTE') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187A'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',

--Private Sector (Corporate)
update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187C'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND TURNOVER>250000000 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187C'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',

and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181','31106') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND 
NVL(TURNOVER,0)<=250000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';

WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',

'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND HNI_NETWORTH>20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')
AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

--Individuals
update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187E'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187E'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',

'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
NVL(legal_entity_type,0)  in('','0')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND
act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

 --Non Banking Financial Institutions
update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187F'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

--Trade Bills
update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187G'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and purpose_of_advn not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code  in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')
AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187G'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  foracid in ('90010800000206') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

update BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE set REPORT_NAME_1 ='BRF45', REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW187' , report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW187G'
WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND  gl_sub_head_code IN ('24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')
AND country_of_incorp IN 'MU';
COMMIT;

COMMIT;
END;
--DETAIL A PROCEDURE
create or replace PROCEDURE         "BRF45A_DETAIL_PROCEDURE" (REPORT_DATE VARCHAR2)
IS
  V_REPORT_DATE DATE := To_date (REPORT_DATE, 'DD-MM-YYYY')  ; 

BEGIN


delete from BRF45A_DETAILTABLE where REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE ;
Commit  ;

--Insert Query
--Government & Public Sector(BRF1)
--LOANS & ADVANCES (GROSS)-8.1	Government & Public Sector-8.1.1	FederalGovt 

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
WHERE constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--8.1.2	Non Commercial entities (Federal Govt)-NIL

--8.1.3	Emirates Governments

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 legal_entity_type IN ('GOVTE') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--8.1.4	Non-commercial entities (Emirates Govt)

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 legal_entity_type IN ('PSENO','PSEN') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')  and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--GREs (BRF1)
--8.1.5	GREs (Govt ownership more than 50%) 

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type NOT in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND 
legal_entity_type IN ('PSEC','PSECO') AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--Private Sector (Corporate)(BRF1)
-- 8.2.1Corporates with Govt ownership of less than 50%-NIL

--8.2.2	Other corporates

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND TURNOVER>250000000 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')  and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--8.2.4	Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs)

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181','31106') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND 
NVL(TURNOVER,0)<=250000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008')  and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--HNI(BRF1)
--8.2.3	High Networth Individuals (HNI)

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND HNI_NETWORTH>20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--Individuals(BRF1)
--8.3	Individuals 

 INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
 where constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND
 NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

 --For one Individuals account 

  INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code  in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVF', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
NVL(legal_entity_type,0)  in('','0')
and NVL(purpose_of_advn,0) not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code not in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146','24171','24176','24181') AND
 act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND NVL(HNI_NETWORTH,0)<=20000000 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ; 

 --Non Banking Financial Institutions(BRF1)
--4.1	NBFI-Loans and advances

  INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where legal_entity_type  IN ('NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ') 
AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0  and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--Trade Bills(BRF1)
--TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED
--7.1	TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED- Gov & Public Sector
--7.1.1	Inland trade bills/ PDCs
--7.1.2	Foreign trade bills (Import and export)

--7.2	TRADE BILLS DISCOUNTED- Private-7.2.1	Inland trade bills/ PDCs

  INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)

SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where constitution_code not in ('44101', '44102',
'44103', '44104', '44105', '44106', '44107', '44108', '44109', '44110', '44111', '44112', '44113', '44114', '44115', '44116', '44199',
'44201', '44202', '44203', '44204', '44205', '44206', '44207', '44208', '44209', '44210', '44211', '44212', '44213', '44214', '44215', 
'44216', '44217', '44299', '71005', 'HUFJT', 'INDL','INDL ', 'INDVM', 'NREIN', 'RESIN','WPS') and 
legal_entity_type not in('GOVTF','CGOVB','CB','GOVT','GOVTL','GOVTE','PSENO','PSEN','PSEC','PSECO','NBFC','MXC','MXC  ','NBFC ')
and purpose_of_advn not in ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9007','9009','9034','9035','9036','9037')
and gl_sub_head_code  in('24101','24102','24116','24117','24122','24146') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

  INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where ACCT_NUMBER in ('90010800000206') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;

--7.2.2	Foreign trade bills (Import and export)

INSERT INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
(CUST_ID,FORACID,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,CONSTITUTION_CODE,
HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc)
SELECT CUST_ID,ACCT_NUMBER,ACCT_NAME,ACCT_CRNCY_CODE,GL_CODE,GL_SUB_HEAD_CODE,SCHM_CODE,SCHM_TYPE,SOL_ID,ACID,LEGAL_ENTITY_TYPE,
CONSTITUTION_CODE,HNI_NETWORTH,TURNOVER,COUNTRY_OF_INCORP,COUNTRY,PURPOSE_OF_ADVN,REPORT_DATE,act_balance_amt_lc FROM GENERAL_MASTER_TABLE
where gl_sub_head_code IN ('24171','24176','24181') AND act_balance_amt_lc<0 AND SOL_ID IN ('9001','9002','9003','9004','9005','9008') and report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE ;


MERGE INTO BRF45A_DETAILTABLE M
USING (
    SELECT distinct   b.REPORT_LABEL_1,b.cust_id,b.foracid,B.REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1,B.REPORT_NAME_1,b.nre_status
    FROM BRF45_MAPPING_TABLE b
    JOIN BRF45A_DETAILTABLE a ON a.foracid = b.foracid
    WHERE a.report_date = V_REPORT_DATE
) S
ON (M.foracid = S.foracid)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
SET M.REPORT_LABEL_1 = S.REPORT_LABEL_1,
M.nre_status = S.nre_status,
M.REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1 = S.REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1,
M.REPORT_NAME_1 = S.REPORT_NAME_1
WHERE M.report_date =  V_REPORT_DATE  ;
COMMIT ;

COMMIT ;
END  ;

--DETAIL B PROCEDURE

create or replace PROCEDURE         "BRF45B_DETAIL_PROCEDURE" (REPORT_DATE VARCHAR2)
IS
  V_REPORT_DATE DATE := To_date (REPORT_DATE, 'DD-MM-YYYY')  ; 

BEGIN


delete from BRF45B_DETAILTABLE where report_date = V_REPORT_DATE ;
Commit  ;

--report_addl_criteria_1 = CELL WISE UPDATE
--report_addl_criteria_2 = COUNTRY NAME

INSERT INTO brf45B_detailtable 
( REPORT_LABEL_1, REPORT_NAME_1, REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1,REPORT_DATE)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT 
    --LISTAGG(FORACID, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY FORACID) AS FORACID,
    MAX(REPORT_LABEL_1) AS REPORT_LABEL_1,
    MAX(REPORT_NAME_1) AS REPORT_NAME_1,
    MAX(REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1) AS REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1,MAX(REPORT_DATE)
FROM 
    brf45a_detailtable 
WHERE 
    REPORT_LABEL_1 > 'ROW183'
GROUP BY 
    REPORT_LABEL_1;

--update ROW185
UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185A' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185' AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET GRE_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185B' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET PRIVATE_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185C' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185' AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE  ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET HNI_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185D' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185E' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET BANKING_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185F' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET TRADE_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185G' AND nre_status='N'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;
--non resident of ROW185
UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185A' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185' AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET GRE_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185B' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185C' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185' AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE  ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET HNI_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185D' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185E' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET BANKING_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185F' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET TRADE_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW185G' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='BVI'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW185'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

--

--update ROW186

SET GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW186A' AND nre_status='N'

),report_addl_criteria_2 ='TANZANIA'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW186' AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE  ;
COMMIT;

SET HNI_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW186D' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='TANZANIA'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW186'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW186E' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='TANZANIA'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW186'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET BANKING_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW186F' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='TANZANIA'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW186'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

UPDATE BRF45B_DETAILTABLE
SET TRADE_NON_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))
    FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE
    WHERE report_addl_criteria_1 = 'ROW186G' AND nre_status='Y'
),report_addl_criteria_2 ='TANZANIA'
WHERE REPORT_LABEL_1 = 'ROW186'  AND REPORT_DATE =V_REPORT_DATE ;
COMMIT;

--update ROW187

SET GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT = (
    SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0))

COMMIT;

END  ;
---SUMMARY PROCEDRE
create or replace PROCEDURE         "BRF45_SUMMARY_PROCEDURE" (Report_date VARCHAR2)
IS
----30-SEP-2020--
---VARARIBLE DECLARE
V_REPORT_DATE DATE := TO_DATE(Report_date,'DD-MM-YYYY');
V_REPORT_DUE_DATE DATE := Add_Months( Last_day (V_REPORT_DATE), +3);
V_REPORT_FROM_DATE DATE := Add_Months( Last_day (V_REPORT_DATE), -3)+1;

V_R19_COUNTRY	varchar2(100 BYTE):='GRAND TOTAL';
V_R19_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT	Number(24,4):=0;
V_R19_GRE_RESIDENT	Number(24,4):=0;

BEGIN 

delete from BRF45A_SUMMARYTABLE where report_date = V_REPORT_DATE;
Commit;
delete from BRF45B_SUMMARYTABLE where report_date = V_REPORT_DATE;
Commit;
delete from BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE where report_date = V_REPORT_DATE;
Commit;

INSERT INTO BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE 
(COUNTRY, GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT, GRE_RESIDENT, PRIVATE_RESIDENT,
HNI_RESIDENT, INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT, BANKING_RESIDENT, TRADE_RESIDENT,
GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT, GRE_NON_RESIDENT, PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT,
HNI_NON_RESIDENT, INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT, BANKING_NON_RESIDENT,
TRADE_NON_RESIDENT, REPORT_LABEL,REPORT_DATE)
SELECT report_addl_criteria_2, GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT, GRE_RESIDENT, PRIVATE_RESIDENT,
HNI_RESIDENT, INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT, BANKING_RESIDENT, TRADE_RESIDENT,
GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT, GRE_NON_RESIDENT, PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT,
HNI_NON_RESIDENT, INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT, BANKING_NON_RESIDENT,
TRADE_NON_RESIDENT, REPORT_LABEL_1,REPORT_DATE
FROM BRF45B_DETAILTABLE WHERE  REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE;

SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0)) INTO V_R21_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND REPORT_LABEL_1 ='ROW103'  AND REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1= 'ROW103A' AND nre_status='N';
SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0)) INTO V_R21_GRE_RESIDENT FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND REPORT_LABEL_1 ='ROW103' AND REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1= 'ROW103B' AND nre_status='N';

-- ADD 
V_R20_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT:=V_R22_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+V_R21_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT;
V_R20_GRE_RESIDENT:=V_R22_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R21_GRE_RESIDENT;
V_R20_PRIVATE_RESIDENT:=V_R22_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R21_PRIVATE_RESIDENT;
V_R20_HNI_RESIDENT:=V_R22_HNI_RESIDENT+V_R21_HNI_RESIDENT;
V_R20_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT:=V_R22_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT+V_R21_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT;
V_R20_BANKING_RESIDENT:=V_R22_BANKING_RESIDENT+V_R21_BANKING_RESIDENT;
V_R20_TRADE_RESIDENT:=V_R22_TRADE_RESIDENT+V_R21_TRADE_RESIDENT;
V_R20_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_GRE_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_GRE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_GRE_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_HNI_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_HNI_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_HNI_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT;
V_R20_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R22_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R21_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT;

+V_R60_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+V_R61_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+V_R62_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+ V_R63_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+ V_R64_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT;

V_R54_GRE_RESIDENT:=V_R55_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R56_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R57_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R58_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R59_GRE_RESIDENT
+V_R60_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R61_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R62_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R63_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R64_GRE_RESIDENT;

V_R54_PRIVATE_RESIDENT:=V_R55_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R56_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R57_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R58_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R59_PRIVATE_RESIDENT
+V_R60_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R61_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R62_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R63_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R64_PRIVATE_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT+V_R91_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT;

V_R90_GRE_RESIDENT:=V_R92_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R93_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R94_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R95_GRE_RESIDENT
+V_R96_GRE_RESIDENT+V_R91_GRE_RESIDENT;

V_R90_PRIVATE_RESIDENT:=V_R92_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R93_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R94_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R95_PRIVATE_RESIDENT
+V_R91_PRIVATE_RESIDENT+V_R96_PRIVATE_RESIDENT;

V_R90_HNI_RESIDENT:=V_R92_HNI_RESIDENT+V_R93_HNI_RESIDENT+V_R94_HNI_RESIDENT+V_R95_HNI_RESIDENT
+V_R96_HNI_RESIDENT+V_R91_HNI_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT+V_R91_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_BANKING_RESIDENT+V_R91_BANKING_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_TRADE_RESIDENT+V_R91_TRADE_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_GRE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_GRE_NON_RESIDENT;

+V_R91_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R96_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_HNI_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_HNI_NON_RESIDENT;

+V_R96_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT;

V_R90_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R92_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT+V_R93_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT+V_R94_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT+V_R95_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT
+V_R96_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT;

V_R90_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT:=V_R92_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R93_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R94_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R95_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT
+V_R96_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT+V_R91_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT;

SELECT round(nvl(sum(abs(ACT_BALANCE_AMT_LC))/1000,0)) INTO V_R98_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT FROM BRF45A_DETAILTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE AND REPORT_LABEL_1 ='ROW180'  AND REPORT_ADDL_CRITERIA_1= 'ROW180A' AND nre_status='N';

--REMAINING 
update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT_REM 
=(SELECT SUM(GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set GRE_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(GRE_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set PRIVATE_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(PRIVATE_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set HNI_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(HNI_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);


update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set BANKING_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(BANKING_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set TRADE_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(TRADE_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

--NON RESIDENT
update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT_REM 
=(SELECT SUM(GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set GRE_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(GRE_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set HNI_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(HNI_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);


update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set BANKING_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(BANKING_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);

update BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE set TRADE_NON_RESIDENT_REM
=(SELECT SUM(TRADE_NON_RESIDENT) 
FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE);
--
 SELECT max(GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_GOVERNMENT_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE ;
 SELECT max(GRE_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_GRE_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE  ;
 SELECT max(PRIVATE_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_PRIVATE_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE  ;
 SELECT max(HNI_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_HNI_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE  ;
 SELECT max(INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_INDIVIDUAL_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE ;
 SELECT max(BANKING_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_BANKING_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE  ;
 SELECT max(TRADE_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_TRADE_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE ;
 SELECT max(GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_GOVERNMENT_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(GRE_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_GRE_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_PRIVATE_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(HNI_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_HNI_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_INDIVIDUAL_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(BANKING_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_BANKING_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
 SELECT max(TRADE_NON_RESIDENT_REM) INTO V_R102_TRADE_NON_RESIDENT FROM BRF45C_SUMMARYTABLE WHERE REPORT_DATE = V_REPORT_DATE   ;
